basic.nameExists: The knowledge Graph name already exists. Please re-enter.
basic.nameConsists: Only support Chinese and English, numbers and underline
basic.desConsists: Only support Chinese and English, numbers and special characters on the keyboard
basic.dbnameConsists: Only support English, numbers and underline
basic.dbExists: The DB name already exists. Please re-enter
basic.dbwarning: Duplicate DB names may overwrite the original knowledge network!
basic.storagePlace: Please select a storage location to store
basic.clickFirst: If you need to create a knowledge map, please first
basic.dbError: Storage location is Nebula type, the db name only supports lowercase letters and numbers, and starts with an English letter

datasource.deleteTip: Are you sure to delete the data source?
datasource.deleteContent: Once the data source is deleted, it cannot be retrieved. Please exercise caution when performing this operation!
datasource.noChecked: Please select at least one data source

information.addSourceTip: You can select the data source file or click the file to see details
information.placeAddDs: Please select data source and add extraction rule
information.isDeleteTitle: Are you sure to remove it?
information.isDeleteText: Once the current data is removed, it cannot be retrieved. Please exercise caution when performing this operation!
information.isDelRuleText: The current content cannot be retrieved after deletion. Please operate with caution.
information.getRulesError: The file cannot predict the ontology, you can add the ontology in other ways
information.fileNoExist: The file does not exist. The rule will not be available. Please select again
information.nodir: The folder does not exist.The rule will not be available. Please select again
information.removeFail: Failed to remove file. Please try again!
information.ruleDelFail: Failed to delete extraction rule. Please try again!
information.as7BeOver: The data source authorization has expired. Please reauthenticate and use it!
information.addMaxErr: Up to 100 data can be selected at a time
information.nameConsists: Only support Chinese and English, numbers and underline
information.used: The data source is being used and cannot be cancelled
information.regError: Please enter the correct regular expression
information.nameHolder: Please enter the entity class name
information.ruleError: Incorrect configuration of extraction information item, please modify
information.noRule: No rules. Please add extraction rules
information.leastSource: Please select at least one data source and add rules
information.leastData: Please select at least one data
information.empty: Click the | [Add] | button to add data
information.syncTip: Tips: When the data in the data source changed, click [Reload Data] to the right of the data source title to update it
information.leastRule: Add at least one extraction rule
information.before: Data from the previous hour of the previous day
information.correct: Please enter the correct partition variable
information.extractingTip: Operation failed, the extracting file is loading, please try again later
information.sqlExtractFormItemSqlPlaceholder:
1. If there is a JOIN operation in SQL:
You'd better to avoid a full table scan if the operation involves a join field between two tables in the index;
Ensure that there are no duplicate field names in the query results
2. Only support querying single statement in database
information.sqlExtractRepeatTip: Duplicate file names with those under the data source
information.sqlExtractTip: Please enter SQL query statement, run and preview data
information.sqlEmptyTip: SQL query statement cannot be null
information.clearConfigTitle: Are you sure to empty the configuration items?
information.clearConfigContent: The configuration cannot be restored after clearing.Please exercise caution when performing this operation!
information.showOnly: Top 100 items of the data are displayed
information.timeToolTip: Data from this time period will be used to build the knowledge graph.
information.pleaseSelectTime: Please select the time for data extraction first
information.errorTip: The data is abnormal. Please check the data

knowledge.veDes: Entity class name in ontology and  in data source
knowledge.EdgeDes: The name of the edge in the ontology and the name of the edge in the data source
knowledge.IdenDes: Unique field that identifies the entity
knowledge.mapDes: Mapping between entity class properties in ontology and entity attributes in data source
knowledge.mapDesR: Mapping between relationship class properties in ontology and relationship class properties in data source
knowledge.emptyInfo: After clearing, the current content cannot be retrieved. Please operate with caution.
knowledge.inDes: Relationship source attribute field.For example: Table A, B, vertex from A and B, relationship from A.
knowledge.DSRDes: Relationship between document structure.For example: the relationship between document, title, content.
knowledge.ContainmentDes: There is an inclusion relationship between ontologies.For example: the name attribute of ontology A contains the name attribute of ontology B.
knowledge.OutDes: Relationship source external data.For example: Table A, B, C, vertex from A and B, relationship from C.
knowledge.indepenDes: Relationship source attribute field,data rows are triples.For example: the same data row of table A contains both entities and relationships.
knowledge.ConfigFirst: Please configure point class mapping information
knowledge.relationAttr: [start point] extract relationship object attribute [end point]
knowledge.notEdgeTip: Edge class has no attributes and no configuration is required

conflation.pleaseOpen: No fusion rules click 【open fusion and fill in to merge the same entity
conflation.pleaseAdd: Click| [Add] |button to add attribute configuration information
conflation.successInfo: The  knowledge map has been configured and you can go to view task execution details.

operationTooltip.details: Search or select entity class/relationship class to be configured in the {box}
Click $icon-mouse_add$ and click the entity class/relationship class attribute
Click $icon-lajitong$ to remove all connected entity class/relationship class attributes
Click $icon-mouse_add$ in data list and then click data mapping

operationTooltipViewMode.details: Search or select entity class/relationship class to be viewing configured in the {box}

knowledgeMap.addDataFileTip: Select any file in the data source list
knowledgeMap.addDataFileTips1: Click $icon-tianjiashuju2$ in the top toolbar to add data files needed in the attribute mapping
knowledgeMap.addDataFileTips2: Click $icon-tianjiashuju2$in the top toolbar to add data files needed in the attribute mapping; If relationship attribute mapping is not required, you can directly link 'start point-end point' to establish a relationship
knowledgeMap.mapTips1: Complete your attribute mapping manually or by clicking $icon-tianjialianjie1$ in the toolbar
knowledgeMap.mapTips2: After attribute mapping, you need to manually connect the start and end points to the data files
knowledgeMap.mapTips3: Interconnect the start and end points with the data file
knowledgeMap.errorTips1: Please configure the relationship between the default show attribute, fusion attribute and data files
knowledgeMap.searchPlaceholder: Search for entity class/relationship class name
knowledgeMap.autoMapFailTips: No recommended data can be used in relationship mapping, please link manually
knowledgeMap.addDataFileModalTitle: Are you sure to switch the data file?
knowledgeMap.addDataFileModalContent: After switching, the configurations cannot be undone.  Please operate with caution.
knowledgeMap.addDataFileRequireTip: Select at least one data source file
knowledgeMap.autoMapNoResultTip: No change for auto mapping results
knowledgeMap.fileNotExist: Data file not found, you need to change or delete the data file
knowledgeMap.sqlChangeTip: The data source name/SQL query statement has been changed and not taken effect, it needs to be run to take effect
knowledgeMap.defaultTagRequiredTip: Please configure the relationship between the default show attribute and the data file
knowledgeMap.mergeRequiredTip: Please configure the relationship between the fusion attribute and the data file
knowledgeMap.graphConfigErrorTips: Configuration error, please change your configuration
knowledgeMap.x6RelStartEndRequiredTip: Please configure the relationship between the start point, end point entity class attributes and data files
knowledgeMap.x6RelStartNodeRequiredTip: Please configure the relationship between the start point entity class attributes and data files
knowledgeMap.x6RelEndNodeRequiredTip: Please configure the relationship between the end point entity class attributes and data files
knowledgeMap.x6RelStartEndNoFileRequiredTip: Please link the attribute relationship for the start point and the end point
knowledgeMap.fieldNoExistTips: Field not found, please refresh the data file
knowledgeMap.fieldMapUniqueError: Attribute mapping error, only supports 1-to-1 matching of entity class attributes to data fields

workflow.exitText: Not saved yet. After exiting, the configured content cannot be restored. Please operate with caution.
workflow.exitText1: Current configuration not saved. The configured content will not be retrived if you abandon the save. Please exercise caution when performing this operation!
workflow.tooltiptex: the system will automatically synchronize the updated content to the data source list
workflow.toolThree: The system will automatically create/update ontology to the ontology library list
